text: right Nusratullo Maksum (; 1 July 1881 – 1 November 1937)http://www.mrwolf.ru/Kultura_i_iskusstvo/Istoriya/9157 also known as Nusratullo Lutfullayev, was a Tajikstani Soviet politician. He was a recipient of the Order of the Red Banner. From March 1931 to January 1934 he served on the Central Executive Committee of the Soviet Union as the representative of the Tajik Soviet Socialist Republic. He was executed by firing squad during the Great Purge. After the independence of Tajikistan from the Soviet Union, Maksum was featured on the 200 Tajikistani somoni banknote. ==References== Category:1881 births Category:1937 deaths Category:Recipients of the Order of the Red Banner Category:People executed by the Soviet Union Category:Great Purge victims from Tajikistan Category:Soviet politicians Category:People executed by firing squad Category:Tajikistani politicians
title: Nusratullo Maksum
